com.vise.xsnow.ui.adapter.helper

类 HelperAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.vise.xsnow.ui.adapter.BaseAdapter<T>
        • com.vise.xsnow.ui.adapter.helper.HelperAdapter<T>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, DataHelper<T>

    public abstract class HelperAdapter<T>
extends BaseAdapter<T>
implements DataHelper<T>
